description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Palm Beach, Australia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Boutique Coastal Escape in Sydney's Affluent Palm Beach
hotels.description: Explore the sun-kissed, famous, blue waters of Sydneyâ€™s Northern Beaches with a stay at the boutique, iconic Barrenjoey House Palm Beach. This oasis boasts a relaxed coastal atmosphere and accompanies the Barrenjoey House restaurant and terrace, which showcases modern Australian flavours, fresh seafood and refreshing cocktails. After a day at the beach, you'll be thrilled to return to this idyllic accommodation and put your feet up in the shared lounge.

seo.title: Hotel a Palm Beach - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
